data.message: Hellos Facebook I just got a message giving me a password reset code to my phone as a text message, problem is I didn't even try to change my password, what do I do???

replies.message: Hi Nancy. If someone has tried to log into your account without your permission, you can secure it using the tips here: http://bit.ly/2dxTht8. -Kevin

Facebook Hi Facebook i need help . My girlfriend account has been hacked as well as the email she used to reset the password. Current account also has been temporary disable by hacker . Can Facebook support team PM me to assist ? I do visit help central but none of the method work for me . She feel very sad because there's too much precious memories inside the account. Please help me . Thank you .
Facebook hi messenger bug cannot load my conversations please fix the bug. Thanks
Facebook I don't see my notice on Facebook. Why?
Why is facebook not answering there messages?
